        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • startObserving

        public void startObserving()
        Description copied from interface: GLMapItem2
        Start observing the subject. This method should register callback listeners on any properties of the subject that would affect its rendered representation.

        Invoking this method should generally refresh the state of the item.

        This method may not be invoked on the GL context thread.

        Specified by:
        startObserving in interface GLMapItem2
        Overrides:
        startObserving in class GLPointMapItem2

      • stopObserving

        public void stopObserving()
        Description copied from class: AbstractGLMapItem2
        Stops observing the subject. This method should unwind any callback listeners registered via AbstractGLMapItem2.startObserving().

        This method may not be invoked on the GL context thread.

        Specified by:
        stopObserving in interface GLMapItem2
        Overrides:
        stopObserving in class GLPointMapItem2
